amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following: SEC. 3. ENSURING THE USE OF THE BEST SCIENCE. Nothing in this Act shall prevent the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from considering or relying upon any peer-reviewed scientific publication even if such publication is based on data that is prohibited from public dislosure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-37 to allow the EPA to use all peer-reviewed scientific publications.
